content: Is anyone working with AuditEvent or Provenance? I am working on an app that uses AuditEvent, so would like to find some data to look at.
If you use the latest version of Synthea, and enable US Core (off by default), it will produce a Provenance resource in each Bundle it produces. No AuditEvents though.
I can supply a sample Bundle if you want.

I can supply a sample Bundle if you want.

yes please do. If you don't mind your samples might become discussion this week at security wg, and/or brought into an IG or core as good examples.
There are 10 files in that folder. Each contains a Bundle with a single Patient and associated resources. The last resource in each Bundle should be a Provenance. Let me know if you have issues.

The Provenance looks okay... minimal... I would like to see the Provenance.activity indicate the activity that caused the export, or even just the fact that this was an export... Mostly why was this bundle with this Provenance and resources created; should be explained in the Provenance.

now that brings up a problem I have noticed... the Provenance.activity does not include a very helpful valueset. It should have more useful activities including the EHR lifecycle events. There is a CP, would appreciate support at addressing GF#23712
